channel.title: Solved please remove
channel.description: im trying to turn project exile into a .jar so i can release to some friends so we can mess around but jar maker just puts it to a .zip anyone know how to fix this

item.title: Solved please remove
item.dc:creator: @crimsonbow13 crimsonbow13
item.description:
@crimsonbow13 wrote:

Nicksworld:

im trying to turn project exile into a .jar so i can release to some friends so we can mess around but jar maker just puts it to a .zip anyone know how to fix this

I’m not professional, but I believe you’re saying you want to send your client to your friends so they can log on your server right? But you want to send them a .jar? If you make the client a jar file, then compress it to zip, send it to them, when they extract to desktop it should be a jar. If not, just tell them how to jar it. Hope I could help with my little knowledge of clientside work. Take a look at my thread, I need help with something aswell.

Read full topic
